Package com.giift.sdk.data

This package contains all the data model that shall be used to maintain and manipulate data locally, it contains some SQLiteOpenHelper and a ContentProvider (GiiftProvider)

See: Description

    Class Description
    About
    About content is an html content describing a Dmo.
    AdminContent  
    AndroidPay
    -- Dont forget to add this in the App Manifest

    Enable Wallet API.This tag is required, it serves as a signal from the app that it uses Wallet APIs.

    A coupon is a kind of best deal.
    Currency
    A currency is basically the link between a iso code and the corresponding symbol.
    DbHelperSelector
    Utility function which helps accessing a GiiftDbHelper or a GiiftSQLiteAssetHelper, depending on the presence of a giift.db file availability.
    Delivery  
    Dmo
    A dmo (or program) holds the generic description of a program.
    Favourites  
    GiiftContract
    Helper class, which gives access to the database
    GiiftDbHelper
    Simple db helper that will try to initialize a db from the databases/create.sql file present on the app assets.
    GiiftProvider
    Content provider use to store access locally the data.
    GiiftSQLiteAssetHelper
    Especially, when the apk embeds the whole brand index, We rely on SQLiteAssetHelper, as it helps to pre-load easily the database file and ship it with the APK.

    List of transactions attached to a Card.

Package com.giift.sdk.data Description

This package contains all the data model that shall be used to maintain and manipulate data locally, it contains some SQLiteOpenHelper and a ContentProvider (GiiftProvider)
